trans-unit.source: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of asymmetric algorithms must inherit.
trans-unit.target: Representerer abstrakt basisklasse som må arver fra alle implementeringer av asymmetriske algoritmer.

trans-unit.source: Asymmetric cryptographic algorithms, also known as public-key algorithms, require that both sender and receiver maintain a pair of related keys: a private key and a public key.
trans-unit.target: Asymmetriske kryptografiske algoritmer, også kalt fellesnøkkel algoritmer, krever at både avsenderen og mottakeren beholder to relaterte nøkler: en privat nøkkel og en fellesnøkkel.

trans-unit.source: Both keys are unique to the entity.
trans-unit.target: Begge nøkler er unike for enheten.

trans-unit.source: The public key can be made available to anyone; this key is used for encoding data that is sent to a receiver.
trans-unit.target: Fellesnøkkelen kan bli gjort tilgjengelig for alle; Denne nøkkelen brukes til kode data som er sendt til en mottaker.

trans-unit.source: The private key must be kept private by the receiver; this key is used for decoding messages encoded using the receiver's public key.
trans-unit.target: Den private nøkkelen må holdes private av mottakeren; Denne nøkkelen brukes til dekoding meldinger som ble kodet ved bruk av fellesnøkkel for den mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class is an implementation of a public-key algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>klassen er en implementering av en fellesnøkkel algoritme.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: For an in-depth discussion of public-key encryption and algorithms, see the "Public-Key Encryption" section in [Cryptographic Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: En detaljert beskrivelse av fellesnøkkel kryptering og algoritmer i avsnittet "Fellesnøkkel kryptering" i [kryptografitjenester](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For information about how to use the Strong Name tool (Sn.exe) to create key pairs, see [How to: Create a Public-Private Key Pair](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du bruker verktøyet sterkt navn (Sn.exe) til å opprette nøkkelpar [slik: opprette et felles-Private nøkkelen nøkkelpar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can use public-key systems to form digital signatures.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke fellesnøkkel systemer for å utgjøre signaturer.

trans-unit.source: Digital signatures are used to help to protect the integrity of data.
trans-unit.target: Signaturer brukes til å beskytte integriteten til data.

trans-unit.source: For example, to use a public-key system to digitally sign a message, the sender first applies a hash function to the message to create a message digest.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å bruke en fellesnøkkel systemet til å signere en melding, gjelder avsenderen først en hash-funksjonen meldingen for å lage et meldingssammendrag.

trans-unit.source: The sender then encrypts the message digest with the sender's private key to create the sender's personal signature.
trans-unit.target: Avsenderen krypterer deretter meldingsgodkjenningen med avsenderens private nøkkelen til å opprette avsenderens personlig signatur.

trans-unit.source: Upon receiving the message and signature, the receiver decrypts the signature using the sender's public key to recover the message digest and hashes the message using the same hash algorithm that the sender used.
trans-unit.target: Etter at du mottar meldingen og signaturen, mottakeren dekrypterer signaturen ved bruk av fellesnøkkel for avsenderens gjenopprette meldingsgodkjenningen og hashes meldingen med den samme hash-algoritmen som brukes av avsenderen.

trans-unit.source: If the message digest that the receiver computes matches the message digest received from the sender, the receiver can assume that the message was not altered while in transit.
trans-unit.target: Hvis meldingsgodkjenningen mottakeren beregner samsvarer med meldingsgodkjenningen mottatt fra avsenderen, kan mottakeren anta at meldingen ikke ble endret mens du er i transitt.

trans-unit.source: Note that anyone can verify a signature, because the sender's public key is common knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at alle kan bekrefte en signatur fordi avsenderens fellesnøkkelen er felles kunnskap.

trans-unit.source: This technique does not retain the secrecy of the message; for the message to be secret, it must also be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden beholder ikke PFS for meldingen. for å være hemmelige meldingen, må det også krypteres.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides the following classes that implement digital signature algorithms: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa> (base class), and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng>.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework gir følgende klasser som implementerer algoritmer for digital signatur: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa>(basisklasse), og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography> namespace provides concrete classes for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> only.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography>navneområdet gir konkrete klasser for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>bare.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography>

trans-unit.source: To learn how to use the RSA algorithm to encrypt and decrypt XML data, and create and verify XML digital signatures, see these articles: - [How to: Encrypt XML Elements with Asymmetric Keys](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [How to: Decrypt XML Elements with Asymmetric Keys](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [How to: Sign XML Documents with Digital Signatures](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [How to: Verify the Digital Signatures of XML Documents](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
trans-unit.target: For å lære hvordan du bruker RSA-algoritmen til å kryptere og dekryptere XML-data, opprette og kontroller XML-signaturer, kan du se disse artiklene:- [slik: kryptere XML-elementer med asymmetriske nøkler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [slik: dekryptere XML-elementer med asymmetriske nøkler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [slik: Logg XML-dokumenter med signaturer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) - [slik: bekrefte den digitale signaturer av XML-dokumenter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke opprette en forekomst av en abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: Application code creates a new instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Programmet kode oppretter en ny forekomst av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> classes are the only currently supported implementations.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>og <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>klasser er bare støttes for øyeblikket implementeringer.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the derived class is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Implementeringen av den utledede klassen er ikke gyldig.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This method is a simple call to the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er en enkel kall til den <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> class to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Kaller `Dispose` tillater ressursene som brukes av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>klassen for å være tildeles på nytt til andre formål.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om `Dispose`, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a default cryptographic object used to perform the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et kryptografisk objekt brukes til å utføre den asymmetriske algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider"></xref> instance, unless the default settings have been changed with the [<cryptoClass> element](../Topic/%3CcryptoClass%3E%20Element.md).
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider"> </xref> serverforekomsten, med mindre standardinnstillingene er endret med den [ <cryptoClass> elementet](../Topic/%3CcryptoClass%3E%20Element.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the specified implementation of an asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av den angitte implementeringen av en asymmetrisk algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The asymmetric algorithm implementation to use.
trans-unit.target: Den asymmetriske Algoritmeimplementeringen skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the valid values for the `algName` parameter and the algorithms they map to.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser gyldige verdier for den `algName` parameteren og algoritmer de er tilordnet til.

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
trans-unit.target: Verdien for parameteren

trans-unit.source: Implements
trans-unit.target: Implementerer

trans-unit.source: System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
trans-unit.target: System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm

trans-unit.source: RSA
trans-unit.target: RSA

trans-unit.source: System.Security.Cryptography.RSA
trans-unit.target: System.Security.Cryptography.RSA

trans-unit.source: DSA
trans-unit.target: DSA

trans-unit.source: System.Security.Cryptography.DSA
trans-unit.target: System.Security.Cryptography.DSA

trans-unit.source: ECDsa
trans-unit.target: ECDsa

trans-unit.source: ECDsaCng
trans-unit.target: ECDsaCng

trans-unit.source: System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng
trans-unit.target: System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng

trans-unit.source: ECDH
trans-unit.target: ECDH

trans-unit.source: ECDiffieHellman
trans-unit.target: ECDiffieHellman

trans-unit.target: ECDiffieHellmanCng

trans-unit.source: System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng
trans-unit.target: System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified asymmetric algorithm implementation.
trans-unit.target: En ny forekomst av den angitte asymmetriske Algoritmeimplementeringen.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den gjeldende forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>.
trans-unit.target: Kall `Dispose` når du er ferdig med <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Den `Dispose` metoden forlater den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>i en ubrukelig tilstand.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Etter kall `Dispose`, må du frigi alle referanser til den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>Slik saneringsoppsamlingen kan gjenvinne minnet som den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>ble bruker.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [implementere metoden fjerne](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Alltid kall `Dispose` før du slipper siste referanse til <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Ellers ressurser den bruker vil ikke bli frigjort før saneringsoppsamling kall av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>objektets `Finalize` metode.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> class and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> klasse og frigir eventuelt administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()` metoden og `Finalize` metoden.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: `Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: `Finalize`aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` parameteren er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>referanser.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reconstructs an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> object from an XML string.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, Rekonstruerer en <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> objektet fra en XML-streng.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException>.
trans-unit.target: Ellers oppstår det et <xref:System.NotImplementedException>.</xref:System.NotImplementedException>

trans-unit.source: The XML string to use to reconstruct the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: XML-strengen som skal brukes til Bygg opp den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the key exchange algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, henter navnet på nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel-algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, throws an <xref:System.NotImplementedException>.
trans-unit.target: Ellers oppstår det et <xref:System.NotImplementedException>.</xref:System.NotImplementedException>

trans-unit.source: The name of the key exchange algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på nøkkelens utvekslingsnøkkel-algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the key modulus used by the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir størrelsen, i biter, med nøkkel modulus brukes av den asymmetriske algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The valid key sizes are specified by the particular implementation of the asymmetric algorithm and are listed in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldig nøkkel størrelsene angis av bestemt implementeringen av den asymmetriske algoritmen og er oppført i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The size, in bits, of the key modulus used by the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen, i biter brukes av algoritmen asymmetriske nøkkelen modulus.

trans-unit.source: The key modulus size is invalid.
trans-unit.target: Modulstørrelsen er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: Represents the size, in bits, of the key modulus used by the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Representerer størrelsen, i biter brukes av algoritmen asymmetriske nøkkelen modulus.

trans-unit.source: The valid key sizes are specified by the particular implementation of the asymmetric algorithm and are listed in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ugyldig nøkkel størrelsene angis av bestemt implementeringen av den asymmetriske algoritmen og er oppført i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A>

trans-unit.source: This field is accessed through the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeySize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeySize%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.KeySize%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key sizes that are supported by the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Henter key størrelsene som støttes av den asymmetriske algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The asymmetric algorithm supports only key sizes that match an entry in this array.
trans-unit.target: Den asymmetriske algoritmen støtter bare key størrelser som samsvarer med en oppføring i denne matrisen.

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the key sizes supported by the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: En matrise som inneholder key størrelsene støttes av den asymmetriske algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the key sizes that are supported by the asymmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Angir nøkkelen størrelsene som støttes av den asymmetriske algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The asymmetric algorithm supports only key sizes that match an entry in this array.
trans-unit.target: Den asymmetriske algoritmen støtter bare key størrelser som samsvarer med en oppføring i denne matrisen.

trans-unit.source: This field is accessed through the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Dette feltet er tilgjengelig via den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm.LegalKeySizes%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, gets the name of the signature algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på signaturalgoritmen når implementert i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, always throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException>.
trans-unit.target: Ellers oppstår det et <xref:System.NotImplementedException>.</xref:System.NotImplementedException> alltid

trans-unit.source: The name of the signature algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på signaturalgoritmen.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates and returns an XML string representation of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, oppretter og returnerer en XML-streng som representerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, throws a <xref:System.NotImplementedException>.
trans-unit.target: Ellers oppstår det et <xref:System.NotImplementedException>.</xref:System.NotImplementedException>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include private parameters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere private parametere; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An XML string encoding of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Et XML-strengen kodingen for gjeldende <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm"> </xref> objektet.
